In animation and with robots theres a concept called The Uncanny Valley Its the distance between real and imagined So far no matter how realistic animation or androids are there are tells like shadows or movement where you can still tell its not real With LTBR that valley is very wide Seth paints a wonderful picture of all the things LTBR could be they make sense to us and almost seem real Yet reality remains firmly entrenched in a company selling well below 1 with no revenues in our pocket but plenty in our CEOs Not sure if this chasm will ever be closed but Seth will never stop selling us the story on the other side I find this unsettling and it has brought me close to selling several times
